attributes.action: Put all csa payees on one fair systen that pay equally with the resident parent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we were assessed on an old system and the csa refuse to put us on the new cheaper system we pay double what the new system demands and i feel that we are being descriminated against we cant afford our bills and we are in serious debt all because for one child we pay 400 pound per month my partners wife dumped him for someone else he didnt leave them and now he will suffer for ever he works so hard myself and our daughter dont see him and this must be so for thousands of others we ask you to do something to stop absent parents lifes being ruined and placing there other children in poverty

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
